IMPROVEMENTS: Added more user variables. You now have access to server icon, user and bot avatars in greet messages, triggers, etc. To get a list of all the user variables that you can use, see our [FAQ](https://bastionbot.org/faq) page.
You will now get the exact member count in server when you use the `memberCount` user variable.
Some under-the-hood improvements, to make Bastion even better.
FIXES: Some under-the-hood fixes, as usual, to improve Bastion.
